ygData.subject: Re: Help in dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: He can if he does he s not all that honorable. I do most of my PVP in the Arena zone, (this is a blast by the way, a whole new way to have fun in the
ygData.messageBody:
He "can" if he does he's not all that honorable.

I do most of my PVP in the Arena zone, (this is a blast by the way, a whole
new way to have fun in the game...tired of camping for that rare loot? Go
to arena and beat some people down/get beat down.) You can bind in the zone
regardless of class, so downtime is very short (I usually have someone kill
me when I'm oom, so I don't have to waste time medding) There's no looting
and no xp loss, just fun :) Necros are a *very* powerful PVP class,
unfortunately you can't summon a pet in the arena (he kills himself
immediately) but even without him you can kick some ass. I beat down an
equal level enchanter, a magician, a wizard a shaman and a warrior that was
5 levels above me.


----- Original Message -----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 2:34 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


can he get healing from other people while you are dualing?

----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Muller
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:10 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


At level 34 I beat up a level 41 warrior. It's just a matter of
avoidance.
Shadowstep, darkness, shadowstep, dot, shadowstep, dot. It's tough
against
the higher level warriors, just because those bastards have so many
hitpoints :) I'd usually get all my DOT's set, shadowstep once more then
gather shadows and med ;) it's a mean and nasty strategy and they'll
bitch
to no end about you not fighting fair...but hey...if you can't use your
spells, they can't use their weapons and armor ;)

----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 10:05 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
> Last night, I watched a level 26 necromancer with a
> pet, get wiped off of the face of Norrath by a 24th
> level ogre warrior. I have some strategies for necro
> against caster, but how do you fight a warrior? The
> necro could not get any of his spells of as the
> warrior bashed/kicked/slashed him to death. The fight
> took a while as the necro ran around without much
> effect. End result, one dead necro, ogre at half
> health. They only thing I could think of was sic pet,
> shadow step, cast darkness, then proceed.
>
> I guess I have two questions:
>
> What strategy do you all use for necro vs warrior
> type?
>
> What strategy do you all use for necro vs caster type?
>
> I am really curious to see what everyone says to this.
>
> Thanks!
>
> Darkmoon Somberlight
> 24th level necromancer Quellious
>
>
> =====
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not
be
tolerated
>
